solution_line_template: The total number of books in her store after the new donations is {initial_donations}+{donated_books} = <<{initial_donations}+{donated_books}={total_after_donations}>>{total_after_donations} books.
When some of the books are borrowed, her total collection becomes {total_after_donations}-{books_borrowed} =<<{total_after_donations}-{books_borrowed}={remaining_books}>>{remaining_books} books.
